GlobalMatrix class.

detaileddescription.para: A GlobalMatrix is called global, because it can stay on a single or on multiple nodes in a network. For this type of communication, MPI is used.

parameterdescription.para: - can be int, float, double, std::complex<float> and std::complex<double>
